mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(id, title, content, editTime, views, originator) VALUE(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{editTime}, #{views}, #{originator})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, originator, views, date_format(originate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS originate FROM board ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, date_format(originate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS originate, views, originator, date_format(editTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS editTime FROM board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, editTime = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id}
